bug.author: sid-sundrani
bug.summary: pl_examples reinforce_learn_qnet wrong argument name and description in argparse
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pl_examples/domain_templates/reinforce_learn_Qnet.py>refinforce_learn_qnet.py</denchmark-link> , the argument parser adds two arguments that the model doesn't take input to: and . It adds both and arguments instead of just . Can be seen <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/4d9db866a11f3b4b9b923bca811911ac79dad914/pl_examples/domain_templates/reinforce_learn_Qnet.py#L405>here</denchmark-link> . has a wrong description as well (seems to be copied from ). Its description is supposed to be the description of . Can be verified with its <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/blob/8a4cf8f61644c28d6df54ccffe3a52d6f5fce5a6/pl_bolts/models/rl/dqn_model.py>implementation</denchmark-link> in pl bolts
